content: We voted to add a standard extension for valueAttachment R4. This is not a new element but rather a new choice so I am unsure how it works. How does that work technically and logistically? is it part of the CI Build and get published as a technical correction to R4 and official update to R4 or as part of R5? @Grahame Grieve ?
this was resolved over in #fhir/infrastructure-wg ?

this is different the element is the same only an extra choice. So have a couple of issues when applying and using.

  1. when applying the tracker how to indicate the choice valueAttachment is Trial Use vs the element which is Normative.
  2. Ahh so the lightbulb just went on..... the extension would be http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Observation.valueAttachment
